description: This file defines a Flask web route for a health check endpoint, using Flask-Smorest's Blueprint and MethodView to create a simple health status response.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A class representing the health check endpoint, providing a GET method to return health status.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a JSON indicating the service is healthy.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Health Check", "health", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route")$/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Health Check", "health", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route")
